error.validation.date.cms: %value% is not in the correct format
error.route.used.node: Route '%route%' is already used by node %node%
label.breadcrumbs.label: Label
label.breadcrumbs.filter.description: Select the nodes you don't want to include in the breadcrumbs
label.cache.ttl.description: Seconds before the cache is expired
label.confirm.node.clone: Are you sure you want to clone %node%?
label.confirm.node.delete: Are you sure you want to delete %node%?
label.confirm.section.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this section?
label.confirm.theme.delete: Are you sure you want to delete %theme% and all it's custom templates?
label.confirm.widget.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this widget?
label.description.node.description: Give this page a teaser or summary
label.destination.restore.description: Select the parent node for the restore nodes, leave empty to restore to the original location
label.folder.description: Give this folder a meaningful title.
label.image.node.description: You can upload an image which represents this page
label.layout.description: Select a layout for the content of your page
label.locales.available.description: Select the available locales/languages for this page.
label.menu.depth.description: Number of children node levels to fetch
label.menu.title.show.description: Show the name of the parent node as title of the menu
label.method.localization.description: This field can only be set when creating a new site.
label.name.breadcrumb.description: Name of the node in the context of a breadcrumb
label.name.menu.description: Name of the node in the context of a menu
label.name.title: Title
label.name.title.description: Name of the node in the context of a title
label.node.action.advanced.intro: Use this form to edit the node's configuration through key and value pairs. You can prefix a configuration key with a underscore to inherit the configuration value to a lower level.
label.node.action.error.intro: Set error pages for your site to have a more friendly experience.
label.node.action.meta.intro: Set the metadata for this page to improve its visibility in search engines and social media.
label.node.action.structure.intro: Enter a node tree in text format to create your structure quick and swift. Use spaces for hierarchy indentation.
label.node.action.visibility.intro: Determine whether the node is published in the frontend. Optionally you can define a date and time for automatic publication in the future.
label.node.properties.description: Prefix a configuration key with _ to inherit the configuration value to a lower level
label.nodes.trash.description: Select the nodes which you want to restore
label.page.description: Give this page a meaningful title
label.publish.start.description: The date format is YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
label.redirect.name.description: Give this redirect a meaningful name
label.redirect.node.description: Select the node you wish to redirect to
label.redirect.url.description: Enter the URL you wish to redirect to
label.region.select: Select the region you wish to manage:
label.revision.publish.description: Select the revision to which this node should be published
label.route.description:
You can choose a readable web address for this page, for example /about/contact
Set the address to / if you want to set this page as the homepage.
label.section.width.full.description: Use the full page width for this section
label.site.description: Give this site a meaningful title
label.style.title: Title
label.style.subtitle: Subtitle
label.template.widget.description: Select the template for this widget
label.text.locales.all: Make this text the default for all languages
label.theme.description: The theme defines the look & feel of the website.
label.theme.engines.description: Supported template engines of this theme
label.widget.action.visibility.intro: Determine whether the widget is published in the frontend. Optionally you can define a time interval when the widget becomes available.
label.widgets.available.description: Select a widget from this list and add it to the block.
label.widgets.content.description: Click on the icon of a widget to get the context menu. You can reorder the widgets with drag and drop through the handle icon of a widget.
label.url.base.description: Set this when your localized versions have their own URL or when you host multiple sites with one installation.
warning.layouts.none: There are no layouts installed, add some layouts before you try this perform action.
warning.site.delete: Note: all your revisions of this site will be deleted and this action cannot be undone.
warning.widget.properties.inherited: You're about to change the properties of an inherited widget.
